settings.prefix:
declare @Arg sysname declare @Param sysname declare @n int
select @n=0 select @Param='dummy'
create table #srvargs (value nvarchar(512) NOT NULL)
while(not @Param is null) begin select @Param=null select @Arg='SqlArg'+convert(nvarchar,@n)

insert #srvargs select @Param where not @Param is null
select @n=@n+1 end
